Uses of Package
gdi.game.map

Packages that use gdi.game.map
Package
Description
gdi.game
Classes that are needed to provide the most basic game-world infrastructure
gdi.game.dominion
All classes supporting the Dominion game
gdi.game.map
Classes supporting map-based games.
  • Classes in gdi.game.map used by gdi.game
    Class
    Description
    MapWorld
    A MapWord is an extension to the AbstractSpriteWorld that adds a regular grid of MapTiles into the world.
  • Classes in gdi.game.map used by gdi.game.dominion
    Class
    Description
    ArrayMap
    A class that provides a backing array to a generalized Map.
    IsometricMap
    This class provides an Isometric map view.
    Map
    A map is a representation of a regular 2D-grid that is overlaid on top of a world in MapWorld and all its derived classes.
    MapDataProviderInterface
    A MapWorld stores an instance of a Map to separate the playing field into a 2D-Array of Tiles.
    MapSprite
    This class handles the connection between a regular Sprite (a graphical entity that can move freely over the world) and a MapTile (an entity representing one tile on a map).
    MapTile
    This class represent on tile on a Map.
    MapWorld
    A MapWord is an extension to the AbstractSpriteWorld that adds a regular grid of MapTiles into the world.
    WalkingMapSprite
     
  • Classes in gdi.game.map used by gdi.game.map
    Class
    Description
    ArrayMap
    A class that provides a backing array to a generalized Map.
    Map
    A map is a representation of a regular 2D-grid that is overlaid on top of a world in MapWorld and all its derived classes.
    MapSprite
    This class handles the connection between a regular Sprite (a graphical entity that can move freely over the world) and a MapTile (an entity representing one tile on a map).
    MapSprite.SortOrder
    Describes the order for sprite drawing.
    MapTile
    This class represent on tile on a Map.
    MapTile.SelectionMode
    Available selection modes for a tile.
    MapTileAsset
     
    MapWorld
    A MapWord is an extension to the AbstractSpriteWorld that adds a regular grid of MapTiles into the world.
    WalkingMapSprite.Orientation
    The orientation a figure is currently walking in
